name: Infinite Mining Drone
description:
This is a submission to the GoGodotJam.
The entire game was made by Mathéo "Faer" Souville

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

/!\ READ BEFORE PLAYING /!\
- You can pan the view with your middle mouse button.
- you can zoom in/ou with the weel of your mouse.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Build your own asteroid-mining drone ! Is infinite growth possible ?
